tool_description: Updates billing system configurations with new subscription plan details including pricing, features, and billing cycles.

plan_id.description: Unique identifier of the subscription plan

update_type.description: Type of update: price_change, feature_update, full_modification

apply_to_existing.description: Whether to apply changes to existing subscribers

error_messages: Invalid plan_id: Plan must exist in the billing system.
Invalid update_type: Must be one of [price_change, feature_update, full_modification].
Invalid effective_date: Must be a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid new_price: Price must be a non-negative number when provided.
Billing system unavailable: Cannot connect to billing system for updates.
usage: Provide plan_id, update_type, and effective_date. Include new_price for price changes and set apply_to_existing flag as needed.

update_successful.description: Whether the billing system update was successful

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the update transaction

affected_subscriptions.description: Number of subscriptions affected by the update
